state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First, it would be great if you could make an effort to move north. If you can get around to doing that, attempt to venture west. And then, try to go north. And then, take a trip west. Then, attempt to go to the south. Okay, and then, venture south. After that, go to the east. And then, venture south. Then, travel south. If you can do that, make an effort to take a trip east. Then, make an attempt to move east. Then, make an effort to go to the south. After that, head east. Then, head south. Once you get around to doing that, retrieve the coin from the floor of the closet. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Cellar =- You arrive in a cellar. A normal kind of place. You begin looking for stuff. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. > -= Cellar =-0/1
